name: The Gallery (Amy Wu)
description:
Being a detective in the busy MYD city ain't easy work. Honestly, it leaves you little time with leisure activities. This morning's missing person case at the MYD Gallery though, seems like a perfect little getaway- I mean case! For a busy person like you!

You've heard lots of great things about this gallery. For a start, it's the first gallery ever to feature walk-in paintings! Yes! That's right! You can walk into the paintings and experience their worlds! And you, are ready to make yourself comfortable.
